long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Autopilot, powered by Socialdatabase, is an advanced AI tool that translates your audience descriptions into comprehensive targeting setups on X (formerly Twitter). While X hosts a highly relevant user base, navigating its targeting options can be challenging due to some limitations. Autopilot simplifies this process, making it the perfect solution for maximizing your campaign‚Äôs impact.

How It Works:
Autopilot analyzes your audience criteria and quickly generates a complete targeting setup, helping you reach your goals on X in just minutes.

Full targeting setup includes:

X Placements:
- Ads can be displayed across various X placements, enhancing your reach.

Demographics:
- Gender
- Age
- Language
- Location

Devices:
- Operating System
- Device Model
- Carrier

Audiences:
- Custom Audiences

Advanced Targeting Features:
- Follower Look-alikes
- Keywords & Hashtags
- Interests
- Conversation Topics
- Movies & TV Shows

Benefits:
- Speed & Precision: Get a full targeting setup in minutes.
- Easy to use: Simple, intuitive interface for seamless targeting.
- Relevance: Ensure your ads reach the most relevant audience.

Get Started Now:
Leverage the power of X Pro Targeting with Autopilot to boost your ad performance on X. Start optimizing your campaigns today
